title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 10 November 2011 - XWiki
content:
02:17 <sburjan`> has quit  
02:21 <JuanDaugherty> has quit  
02:26 <JuanDaugherty> has joined #xwiki  
06:01 <Denis2> has joined #xwiki

06:59 <xipe> has joined #xwiki  
07:53 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
07:57 <tekzilla> has quit  
07:58 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
08:20 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:25 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
08:36 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* rce01513 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-appwithinminutes/src/main/resources/AppWithinMinutes/StaticList.xml : AppWithinMinutes/ClassEditor: Display "Value" instead of "Label" to be consistent with the Sort options. - http://git.io/282s7A  
08:36 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* r557ee67 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-appwithinminutes/src/main/resources/AppWithinMinutes/StaticList.xml : AppWithinMinutes/ClassEditor: Initialize the StaticList editor after the page is loaded. - http://git.io/g0fn4w  
08:36 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* r638fab7 / xwiki-platform-tools/xwiki-platform-tool-configuration-resources/src/main/resources/xwiki.properties.vm : XWIKI-7116: Add ability to check statuses of External Links ...  
08:36 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* rf538d80 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-rendering/xwiki-platform-rendering-xwiki/src/main/java/org/xwiki/rendering/internal/transformation/icon/XWikiIconTransformationConfiguration.java : Fix javadoc in wrong location - https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/f538d8085721496028c7c926127c83be2914e505  
08:36 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* r387d7d0 / (2 files in 2 dirs): Merge branch 'master' of github.com:xwiki/xwiki-platform into feature-applicationWithinMinutes - http://git.io/FQe3uA  
08:47 <Denis2> is now known as <Denis>  
09:07 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* rff6b21c / (2 files): AppWithinMinutes/ClassEditor: Show 'Default value' tip only for String fields ...  
09:34 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:43 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
10:00 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* r256cba0 / (2 files): AppWithinMinutes/ClassEditor: Actually, it's better to use just a tool tip on all field types rather than displaying the tip only for String fields (at least this way we have consistency). - http://git.io/3s3Qnw  
10:18 <CIA-102> tmortagne master \* r2d09b9d / xwiki-platform-core/pom.xml : XWIKI-7136: Upgrade to Groovy 1.8.4 - http://git.io/q5HD-g  
10:41 <+sburjan> hello everyone  
10:42 <@sdumitriu> Hi sburjan  
10:42 <CIA-102> Sergiu Dumitriu master \* r6d8639e / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/resources/ApplicationResources.properties : XWIKI-7137: Ctrl+V (Paste) doesn't work in the JumpToPage dialog ...  
10:42 <CIA-102> Sergiu Dumitriu master \* rdad13be / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-web/src/main/webapp/resources/js/xwiki/table/livetable.js : XWIKI-7101: Livetable tag cloud does not work in Firefox ...  
10:43 <+sburjan> If I have commit rights on a xwiki-contrib project, is there any rule when we must release a new version ? for example once with the final release of XE or something like that ? Or it's purely when a committer want to release  
10:44 <@sdumitriu> Last, when a committer wants to release  
10:44 <+sburjan> because I want to improve a bit the JIRA Macro, and I want to perform a test before releasing, and I'm afraid that it will be released without a test.  
10:44 <+sburjan> ok, cool, so I don't have to hurry  
11:00 <kwoot> has joined #xwiki  
11:07 <+tmortagne>   p, li { white-space: pre-wrap; }  restarting xwiki.org in 5 minutes  
11:08 <+tmortagne> (trying to upgrade to 3.2 see if it's any better than 3.3)  
15:29 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
15:31 <+tmortagne> vmassol: yep forgot the restart it after the last restart  
15:43 <vmassol> tmortagne: xwiki.org is slow again  
16:13 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
16:23 <vmassol> has quit  
16:31 <CIA-102> Denis Gervalle master \* rda611bb / (7 files in 6 dirs): XCOMMONS-57: Add a new Disposable interface to allow the component manager to properly unregister singleton components - http://git.io/M3rxPA  
16:34 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
16:53 <+tmortagne> Denis: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-rendering/org.xwiki.rendering$xwiki-rendering-transformation-macro/455/testReport/org.xwiki.rendering.internal.macro/DefaultMacroCategoryManagerTest/testGetMacroNamesForCategory/  
16:54 <vmassol> ouch :)  
16:54 <vmassol> unit test missing?  
16:56 <+Denis> no, seems that there is come mismatch between api and impl  
16:57 <+Denis> unit test where missing and was added btw  
16:57 <+Denis> -h  
16:57 <vmassol> Denis: BTW I'd prefer DisposableExcpetion or DisposingException instead of FInalizationExceptoin since otherwise why not have  Finalizable instead of Disposable. Also finalization reminds of JVM stop which isn't what it's happening here.  
16:59 <+Denis> vmassol: Disposable was more usual, and the exception never goes very far since unregister does not throw exception  
16:59 <+Denis> I have found Disposing not really intuitive  
16:59 <vmassol> I prefer Disposable  
17:00 <vmassol> which is why I don't like FinalizationException too much  
17:00 <+Denis> but if you want DisposingException, I really do not matter  
17:01 <vmassol> Disposing seems slightly strang though  
17:01 <vmassol> would need to ask a native speaker like cjdelisle  
17:06 <@cjdelisle> DisposableException is an exception which you can safely throw away  
17:06 <vmassol> hehe  
17:07 <@cjdelisle> if (e instanceof DisposableException) { /\* let the garbage collector get it. \*/  }  
17:08 <@cjdelisle> FinializationException is an exception while finalizing, it sounds more natural than DisposingException although I can't put my finger on why.  
17:08 <@cjdelisle> DispositionException?  
17:09 <@cjdelisle> no, that would be an error from having a nasty disposition.  
17:09 <vmassol> so maybe the best is to have Finalizable and FinalizationException  
17:09 <vmassol> Denis: actually I've checked and Finablizable is quite common  
17:09 <@cjdelisle> +1  
17:09 <vmassol> (I have a lot of it in my classpath)  
17:09 <+Denis> but the meaning is not perfect  
17:11 <+Denis> since you do not really finalize the object, just tells him to dispose ressource and stop servicing, but nothing ensure it will not stay referenced  
17:11 <@cjdelisle> this is when a component is removed from the ECM?  
17:12 <+Denis> when a singleton component is unregistered !  
17:12 <+Denis> if this component implement Disposable, we call dispose()  
17:13 <+Denis> (if it has been already instanciated obviouslyà  
17:13 <@cjdelisle> DisposalException would be the correct term I guess.  
17:13 <vmassol> ah yes sounds better than the other forms  
17:14 <@cjdelisle> but then Deregistration might be a more explanitory term than Disposal but I won't beat that issue.  
17:18 <+Denis> Disposal is also used by other CM  
17:22 <@cjdelisle> ok  
17:46 <+Denis> vmassol: the only way to get the NPE I have is to register a component without implementation, this seems to me really unexpected, and is not checked anywhere  
17:47 <+Denis> on the other hand, I do not see any check ensuring that a descriptor is complete  
17:47 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
17:48 <vmassol> Denis: yes we don't have checks and the reason we allow it is becauase we can register a CD with an instance  
17:49 <+Denis> ok, so you mean I can have no implementation but an instance  
17:49 <vmassol> CM.registerComponent() has 2 sigs  
17:49 <+Denis> yes I know  
17:49 <vmassol> one of them accepts an instance  
17:49 <+Denis> but I never thought that the descriptor could be incomplete  
17:49 <+Denis> this could lead to many other issue  
17:50 <+Denis> since you can release()  
17:50 <+Denis> you can as well register without either implementation nor instance  
17:51 <+Denis> but I will fix to use the instance here, this is find for me  
17:51 <+Denis> s/find/fine/  
17:54 <tmortagne> has quit  
17:54 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
17:54 <tmortagne> has quit
